title: Drawing, "Piazza San Domenico in Bologna; Piazza San Francesco and Villa Aldini in Bologna; Study of Tomb of Glossatori", 1811–14
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush with brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed: 153, 90, Piazza di San Domenico Bologna, Piazza di S. Francesco Bologna, monumento del 3 cento Bologna; monumento dello ingresso e sepolcri di cinquecento Bologna una famiglia illustre.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Piazza San Domenico in Bologna; Piazza San Francesco and Villa Aldini in Bologna; Study of Tomb of Glossatori; Verso: five studies of sepulcri and baptistries.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Piazza San Domenico in Bologna; Piazza San Francesco and Villa Aldini in Bologna; Study of Tomb of Glossatori", 1811–14.
1811–14. Pen and brown ink, brush with brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2742.
